amendment.description: Amendment extends the time frame for holding expedited special elections from 45 days to 49 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by H. Res. 125 to extend the time-frame for holding expedited special elections from 45 days to 49 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ney amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ney amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
